OneLineDescription: Synthesis implementation of ASIS AutomaticPerks patcher with additional features and fixes
LongDescription:
Adds additional perks for npcs around Skyrim.
Use npc stats to set valid perks and because is more correct will be to move the patcher after any other patchers that changing npc stats.
It using not only native settings but also ASIS ini files. When file \Data\SkyProc Patchers\ASIS\AutomaticPerks.ini is exist, parameters from it will be read from into settings before patching.

Use only one Synthesis or ASIS patcher.

Original ASIS patcher LE - https://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18436
ASIS Improved ini - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53047
Automatic spells - https://github.com/TokcDK/SynAutomaticSpells
